title: Champion concept workshops

embed.description: Want to work with a group of other players on a champion design exercise? Designers from the champion team will be on-hand to take you through a design exercise and then your team will present it to the group. Sessions are free and run for 20 minutes.

body:
Thought I would post this here in player creations for anyone that hasn't seen it.

There's going to be a free champion design exercise running at Luna Park in Sydney at the OPL final on August 8.

Rioters from the design team are going to run the exercise, you'll work in groups to come up with a concept, get feedback, present it, etc.

https://www.eventbrite.com.au/e/riot-champion-design-workshop-session-tickets-17221801873

replies.body: It is going to be fun, hope to see some of you there - make sure to get a beforehand ticket though!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Terra,realm=NA,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=K8ubAJ6P,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-07-16T22:15:17.969+0000)
>
> It is going to be fun, hope to see some of you there - make sure to get a beforehand ticket though!

is it likely you guys (and girls) are going to set more of these up in the future in other states and areas?
I am incredibly mad that I miss out on this, I had some amazing designs for a raptor wizard champion.
Wow really wish i could attend.
